description: Smallest positive integer not representable as the sum of at most n distinct numbers of form 2^a*3^b.
links: Valérie Berthé and Laurent Imbert, Diophantine Approximation, Ostrowski Numeration and the Double-Base Number System, Discrete Mathematics and Theoretical Computer Science, vol. 11 (2009) no 1, pp. 153-172
Mike Oakes, Posting to primenumbers list, Aug 30 2003
author: Vassil Dimitrov (vassil(AT)Engn.Uwindsor.Ca), Aug 15 1996
